name: Fullhearted
description:
Help Billy reach the top of the Fullhearted Mountain.

Made in 2 weeks for the August Summer Slow Jam 2021.

Will receive future updates in the upcoming months.

Controls: 

Aiming ( A - Left, D - Right, W - Up)

Moving (A - Left, D - Right, Space - Up)

Shooting (Left Click - Shoot)

Made By:

Christian Fox

Connor Martin

Cooper Rose

Jason Colindres
